hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Mujahid: Concerning the verse "A spring" (17:90), he said: It means "a fountain (of water)." And concerning "Or you cause the sky to fall upon us in pieces as you claim" (17:92), he said: It means "the entire sky." And concerning "Or you bring Allah and the angels before us" (17:92), he said: It means "with each tribe/people separately." And concerning "Or you have a house of gold" (17:93), he said: It means "made of gold." And concerning "We will not believe your ascension until you send down to us a written scripture that we may read" (17:93), this means "from the Lord of the Worlds to such-and-such person, with each man having a document that appears at his head which he reads."
